subject: $59.95 Dreamweaver CS3
body:
People see themselves as the center of the universe and judge everything as it relates to them.

The nation is prosperous on the whole, but how much prosperity is there in a hole?

I consider a goal as a journey rather than a destination. And each year I set a new goal.

The church is so subnormal that if it ever got back to the New Testament normal it would seem to people to be abnormal.

Comedy may be big business but it isn't pretty.

Calamity is the test of integrity.

If you are pre-occupied with life and death then you aren't ready for heaven.

Always remember, Peggy, it's matrimonial suicide to be jealous when you have a really good reason.

A man who exposes himself when he is intoxicated, has not the art of getting drunk.

Actors die so loud.

If we cannot end our differences at least we can make the world safe for diversity.

When the heart grieves over what is has lost, the spirit rejoices over what it has left.

If you're never scared or embarrassed or hurt, it means you never take any chances.
